functions.tag: {filtered_title: "The Other Way", pages: ["{\"text\":\"The barrier was made from old, raw power - something that couldn't be broken by force alone. I needed to overthink it.\\n\\nSo I studied. I let go of everything else. Spent YEARS pushing past every limit anyone ever told me existed.\"}", "{\"text\":\"I was no longer \\\"just\\\" a mage. \\n\\nI am now a man ready to tear the stars apart just to reach her again.\"}"], title: "The Other Way", author: "?????", resolved: 1}
